document.discussion_title: WATCH: Jon Stewart Is Still Enjoying Retirement, Pops Up At WWE SummerSlam
document.topic_text: A JON STEWART . Maybe learn your lines next time, brother! We all love our old mate Jon Stewart, and his devil-may-care attitude towards random post-retirement TV appearances. And because one good turn a year ago deserves another today, Stewart has once again found himself in the weird, wonderful, magnificent world of professional wrestling . Stewart's had a long-standing, if not somewhat odd relationship with the WWE ; appearing as the guest host of Monday Night Raw , lamenting the end of the Undertaker 's mythical WrestleMania streak on ' The Daily Show ,' and conducting a mildly entertaining feud with then-champion Seth Rollins , which culminated in the ultimate swerve when Stewart attacked John Cena at last year's WWE SummerSlam , allowing Rollins to walk away with both the WWE World Heavyweight Championship and the United States Championship . Today, the WWE held its annual summer event (the second biggest on their calendar) at its now-regular home of the Barclay's Centre in Brooklyn. Once again, Stewart was on hand to lend his particular brand of assistance, this time to the * begins hip gyration * WWE World Tag Team Champions The New Day . Filling in for the "injured" Big E , Stewart donned the stable's trademark unicorn horn to introduce Kofi Kingston and Xavier Woods , and also, presumably, to prove that he is not, in fact, booty. Now if only Stewart had had a wee toot on Francesca 2 , we would've really been in business. PRO GRAPS! Source: WWE/YouTube. Posted on: August 22, 2016 6:21AM by Cam Tyeson .
